// NewCompanyForm.jsx
import React from'react';import{Formik,Form,Field,ErrorMessage}from'formik';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import*as Yup from'yup';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{addCompany}from'./slices/companiesSlice';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NewCompanyForm=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const dispatch=useDispatch();const initialValues={name:'',manager_id:''};const validationSchema=Yup.object().shape({name:Yup.string().required('Company name is required'),manager_id:Yup.number().required('Manager ID is required').positive().integer()});const onSubmit=(values,_ref)=>{let{resetForm}=_ref;dispatch(addCompany(values));resetForm();};const handleBack=()=>{navigate('/manage-companies');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleBack,children:"Back to Manage Companies"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Add New Company"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Formik,{initialValues:initialValues,validationSchema:validationSchema,onSubmit:onSubmit,children:_ref2=>{let{isSubmitting}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Field,{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"Company Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorMessage,{name:"name",component:"div"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Field,{type:"number",name:"manager_id",placeholder:"Manager ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorMessage,{name:"manager_id",component:"div"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",disabled:isSubmitting,children:"Submit"})]});}})]});};export default NewCompanyForm;
